tool_description:
API for the United States Federal Court System (commonly referred to as PACER). Search for cases, get detailed docket information, and download filings. Save money by downloading cached copies of documents.

Docket Alarm is for: (1) Financial institutions that want to run background litigation checks on companies; (2) Document management or doc review systems that want to automatically sync data with the court's; and (3) Law firms that want to automate tracking court filings in their cases.
name: Docket Alarm
title: Docket Alarm

api_list.name: Login
api_list.description: Login to the Docket Alarm API
